#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <queue>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <map>
#include <vector>
#include <set>
#include <functional>
#include <utility>
using namespace std;

int mpow(int n) {
    int ret = 1;
    int b = 2;
    while (n) {
        if ( n & 1 )
            ret = (ret*b);
        b = (b*b);
        n >>= 1;
    }
    return ret;
}

int arr[50];

int main() {
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int top = 0;
    while (n) {
      if (n & 1) arr[top++] = 1;
      else
        arr[top++] = 0;
      n >>= 1;
    }
    int length = top;
    /*
    for (int i = 0; i < length; ++i)
      cout << arr[i] << " ";
    cout << endl;
    */
    for (int i = 1; i < length; ++i)
      arr[i] += arr[i-1];

    if (arr[length-1] == 1) {
      cout << length-2 << endl;
      continue;
    } else {
      int res = 999999999;
      top = 0;
      while (!arr[top]) top++;
      for (int i = top; i < length-1; ++i) {
        res = min(res, max(arr[i]+i-1, arr[length-1]-arr[i]+length-2));
      }
      cout << res << endl;
    }
  }
  return 0;
}
